values: The Inexplicable Life: Humility, Hope, and Love in SufferingThe Inexplicable Life: Humility, Hope, and Love in Suffering

Christians can show the world the hope they have within through joyful, humble willingness to suffer wrong and serve, rather than return evil for evil.Christians can show the world the hope they have within through joyful, humble willingness to suffer wrong and serve, rather than return evil for evil.
